alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 11:59AM CDT until May 15 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1159 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Seligman to 2 miles southwest of Reeds Spring, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Green Forest... Beaver... Carrollton... Rudd... Forum... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... Marble... Osage... Urbanette... Rule... Grandview... Dryfork... Metalton... Connor... Coin... Alabam... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
